name: Original Walker: Prologue
description:
Dawn of the 22nd century
Monica opened her eyes from the cold cabin.
Here is the storage room of the Tissot plan, and she is the [excellent female gene carrier] that is frozen for the sake of human fire.

Cruel alien aggression, multi-party chaos, sharply reduced to 300 million humans, and countless politicians
[Tissot plan] full of blood and tears, "senior humans" without bottom line
Senior gene? The hope of human rejuvenation? Infinitely breeding orcs? Or has it become a dead earth?
These are not the ones that Monica cares about...
"I, who am I?"
"What is my past?"
Although she is named Monica, she may have passed away...
Or maybe she is already born again...

Game features:
Battle Survival RPG
Specially optimized combat system
a continuous story
